attributes.action: ask the IOW Council to confer with the Jersey Minister for Roads as to how that Island has, per capita, half the road death rate as compared to the IOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

 Re:   Road deaths.  Isle of Wight.  Campaign440

 Further to my letter to HRH Prince Charles and my e-mail
 to your Minister (DfT) please see attached copies of this
 correspondence.

 I personally think it a disgrace that the DfT, having instructed
 the IW Council to commence a review of Road Safety and speeds,
 are ignoring my reasonable request to find out why the IW
 Council are refusing to accept the invitation proffered by the
 Jersey Minister ! 

 That Council have not provided a satisfactory reason to 
 the Rt.Hon. Andrew Turner.
